amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds by the CFTC to promulgate any final rules under the Commodity Exchange Act as added by the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act until 12 months after the promulgation of final swap transaction reporting rules under the Commodity Exchange Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill by the CFTC to promulgate any final rules under the Commodity Exchange Act as added by the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act until 12 months after the promulgation of final swap transaction reporting rules under the Commodity Exchange Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A047) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 189 (Roll no. 446).
